Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Harlem
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing at Harlem due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing at Harlem due to track switching problems.

Shuttle buses will be available between Harlem/Lake and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Board the Pink Line at Ashland/Lake for continuing service to the Loop.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
